property.name: Race
property.value: Pandora's Box/Alien

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your Darkness or Fire creatures. If you do, put a Darkness or Fire psychic creature that costs 4 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-04 Strong Metal Deck: Strongest National Sport

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-04 Strong Metal Deck: Strongest National Sport

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -2000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) ■ Put a Darkness psychic creature that costs 9 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMD-04 Strong Metal Deck: Strongest National Sport

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Choose one of the following: ► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone: ► Put a darkness psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)
